about_the_game:
Rocklen immerses you in a dynamic world where you'll discover the ancient secrets and hidden unknowns of magic. You choose your path, whether it's hero, villain, wand maker, potions master (and more!): all leading to unleashing your inner arcane potential.

Learn from the best at Rocklen Institute, explore lost lands, specialize your craft, push the envelope of magic, and take part in a magical war.

Rocklen is an open world RPG set in the future when you discover magic is real, and its misuse is causing global conflict. You'll travel the world in your magical quests, slowly learning more about what magic is and how to master it.

What you do with this knowledge is really up to you.

Play on public servers for an MMO experience, or host a private server to play by yourself or with friends.

Learn from the best at Rocklen Institute, explore lost lands, specialize your craft, push the envelope of magic, and take part in a magical war.

Rocklen is an open world RPG set in the future when you discover magic is real, and its misuse is causing global conflict. You'll travel the world in your magical quests, slowly learning more about what magic is and how to master it.

What you do with this knowledge is really up to you.

Play on public servers for an MMO experience, or host a private server to play by yourself or with friends.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 - Catalina
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 - Big Sur
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Rocklen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Rocklen is an MMORPG which immerses you in a dynamic world where you'll discover the ancient secrets and hidden unknowns of magic. You choose your path, whether it's hero, villain, wand maker, potions master (and more!): all leading to unleashing your inner arcane potential.
